name: French Roast 250g + Channi
description:
Bold Cocoa and Bittersweet Flavours: This dark roast delivers a robust, intense profile with deep cocoa notes and a bittersweet finish, creating a rich, satisfying coffee experience. 

Best Enjoyed with Milk: Perfectly bold and smooth with milk, this coffee provides a creamy, full-bodied cup with every brew. 

Includes a Stainless-Steel Channi: This combo includes a stainless steel channi (filter) to make brewing at home simple and mess-free, giving you a well-filtered cup each time—perfect for everyday enjoyment or as a thoughtful gift. 

Versatile Brewing Options—Channi-Friendly for Easy Brewing: Ideal for espresso or manual brewing methods like French Press or Manual Grinder. With the channi, you can also brew a strong, smooth cup effortlessly at home. 

Description: Discover the bold, bittersweet taste of our French Roast, a dark roast coffee designed to be enjoyed with milk for a creamy, full-bodied experience. Perfect for espresso and manual brewing, this coffee can also be easily brewed with the channi, ensuring a smooth, flavourful cup every time
